text:
Jordan Cox (27 May 1992 – 30 April 2020) was an English rugby league footballer. He was born in Hull, England. He last played for Doncaster. He had also played in the Super League for: the Hull Kingston Rovers, the Huddersfield Giants and the Warrington Wolves.
He had also appeared for Newcastle Thunder, Halifax and the Sheffield Eagles outside of the Super League.
Cox died on 30 April 2020 in Hull at the age of 27.
